summary: Two best friends fall in love with a pair of women, but the relationships soon go in very different directions.
cast: Alan Bates|Oliver Reed|Glenda Jackson|Jennie Linden|Eleanor Bron|Alan Webb|Vladek Sheybal|Catherine Willmer|Phoebe Nicholls|Sharon Gurney|Christopher Gable|Michael Gough|Norma Shebbeare|Nike Arrighi|James Laurenson|Michael Graham Cox|Richard Heffer|Michael Garratt|Leslie Anderson|Christopher Ferguson|Richard Fitzgerald|Barrie Fletcher|Brian Osborne|Alex Russell|Petra Siniawski|Fred Wood|Charles Workman
title: Mujeres enamoradas
